file_content.text: This is Captain Yelto to the Imperial boarding party.
I admit, you have us outnumbered and outgunned. You know we're not going to escape.
You're awfully confident for a woman who knows she's beaten.
Then why do you sound pleased?
Tell your crew to stand down and turn command over to me.
You were doomed the moment we found you.
Possibly, but I've still got one option.
This vessel is powered by a type-four hypermatter annihilator. Right now, I'm disabling the safeties and rigging it to self-destruct.
In a few minutes, you, me, my ship and half your fleet will be reduced to stardust.
A few minutes is all I need to take control.
Not if I stop you, first.
I have my doubts. Yelto out.
There's no need to kill yourself. We can work something out!
I'm afraid we can't. Yelto out.
